During first month life infant breastfed , low store aquired fetal life , may cause specific B vitamin deficiency . In study infant birth weight 3000 g study 6 week , 4 6 month . DOC.brief_title: B Vitamin Status Premature Small Gestational Age ( SGA ) Infants
DOC.criteria: Birthweight < 3000 grams Age 6 month ( +/ 0.5 month ) Plasma total homocysteine > 6.5 umol/L Plasma total homocysteine < 6.5 umol/L
